channel.title: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?
channel.description: Does anyone know the method to close a JFrame when another one opens? setVisible() doesn't work becauase that just hides the components. Help appreciated.

item.title: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?

Thanks.

item.title: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

In the method that you open up the newer jFrame with… Put what Bob said to put right before you open up the new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?

item.title: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

jFrame.setVisible(false);
jFrame.dispose();

dispose() releases all gui components and subcomponents for garbage collection. I don’t know what you mean by closing it when another one opens (like if you want it done automatically), but this method you have to call manually.

Read full topic
item.source: Get one JFrame to close when another one opens?
